an insect or similar organism , such as a centipede or an earwig昆虫昆虫或类似的生物，如蜈蚣或土蚣

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English ēarwicga, from ēare 'ear' + wicga 'earwig' (probably related to wiggle); The insect is so named because it was once thought to crawl into the human ear

entry.def: An earwig is a small, thin, brown insect that has a pair of claws at the back end of its body.

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous insects of the order Dermaptera having elongate bodies and slender many-jointed antennae and a pair of large pincers at the rear of the abdomen
